#summary DVD Profiler Provider Information

There are 2 DVD Profiler Plugins.  An internet one, and a local one.

= DVD Profiler Remote Url Provider (dvdprofiler) =
 * Requires Url to be set in the properties
 * Supports multiple Urls
 * Indexes movie list using Lucene for fast lookups

= DVD Profiler Local Provider (dvdprofiler_local) =
 * Requires local Collection.xml and images
 * Supports ONLY single location
 * Indexes movie list using Lucene for fast lookups
